  • Hub Management

Hub Management¶

The system allows creation of unlimited number of Hub Categories and Hub Lists, Hub Categories are what differentiates or describe the various segments and features of your business hubs and office facility, like if you have spaces you call General Space and another called Private Space they will each have a number of sub hubs that might be differentiated by numbers like Room 1, Room 2 and Room 3 These will be known to the system as Hub List together, they are the power of HubBox - Enterprise Hub and Web Product Manager Hub Booking section. Booked Hubs can also me monitored, and canceled.
